original_text: And the servants of the king of Syria said to him, “Their gods are gods of the hills, and so they were stronger than we. But let us fight against them in the plain, and surely we shall be stronger than they.
korean_text: 아람 왕의 신하들이 왕께 아뢰되 그들의 신은 산의 신이므로 그들이 우리보다 강하였거니와 우리가 만일 평지에서 그들과 싸우면 반드시 그들보다 강할지라

sentences.original_text: And the servants of the king of Syria said to him,
“Their gods are gods of the hills,
and so they were stronger than we.
But let us fight against them in the plain,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리가 그들과 평지에서 싸우게 하소서,

sentences.original_text: and surely we shall be stronger than they.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리가 반드시 그들보다 강할 것입니다.
